job_details.degree_required: BS/BA in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent experience

jd: From: Hemant Rawat, convextech hemant@convextech.com Reply to: hemant@convextech.com Hi,Hope you are doing good.!!Please let me know if you are interested in the below position Title: Oracle PL/SQL Backend Developer (expert level).Location:. Onsite - Philadelphia, PA (Local Candidate Preferred)Duration: Long Term Contract.Visa Restrictions: USC/GC preffered.Interview : onsite Job Description: Responsibilities for the Oracle PL/SQL Backend Developer: Taking direction from senior developers and collaborating with internal teams to produce software.Participating in requirements analysis.Interpreting business requirement documents; writing clean, scalable, and functional code; unit testing code; preparing applications for deployment to production; and creating documentation as required.Fixing defects in legacy code.Working with source control on multiple simultaneous branches.Providing production support as needed, this includes being available to provide third tier support to the help desk on assigned weekends and holidays if needed.Improving existing software. Required skills for the Oracle PL/SQL Backend Developer: Proven, expert level experience as a PL/SQL Application Developer using Toad, SQL PlusMust be able to create views, packages, functions, and stored procedures in PL/SQLMust be able to work with collections and async processes.Must be able to interpret execution plans and optimize queries and functions.Must be able to create complex DML, and debug it as needed.Must be able to work remotely and on-site based on client requirements.Must have excellent troubleshooting and communication skills, with strong attention to detail.BS/BA in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent experience Thanks and Regards Hemant RawatUS IT Recruiter |Convex Tech Inc.Email: hemant@convextech.comwww.linkedin.com/in/hemantrawatt
